document.full_text: fans in seattle may remember major league soccer's opening night for the strange news they got just before kickoff: that the team had cut ties with the swiss striker blaise nkufo, one of its three designated players.
document.title: a strange opening night for the sounders
lines_and_colors: fans in seattle may remember major league soccer's opening night for the strange news they got just before kickoff: that the team had cut ties with the swiss striker blaise nkufo, one of its three designated players.
